title: Limitations of PV cells include need for sunlight

content.question: A major limitation of using photovoltaic cells to generate electricity is that they

choices.label: do not produce as much CO2 as other energy sources do
do not produce as much electricity on cloudy days
present a danger to birds and bats
cannot be connected to the electrical grid

content.answer: do not produce as much electricity on cloudy days

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
